messages.message:
One last post before the weekend! Does anyone have context on the following files, *apps.py, projects.py, and app_deployments.py*? I need help trying to send the following metadata for audit logging:

apps.py - apps create, update, delete logging
• app_id
• ~workspace_id~
• ~workspace_name~
projects.py - apps run logging
• ~workspace_id~
• ~app_name~
• ~app_version~
app_deployments.py - app deployments update logging
• app_name
• workspace_id
• workspace_name
• Note: it's inconsistent as sometimes these fields are populated and sometimes they aren't depending on what on the app deployment is being updated
